entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets this morning and with periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
